attributes.action: Stop Michael Owen Commentating on BT Sport & Every other game in the history of the world
attributes.additional_details: Please stop Michael Owen from commentating on BT Sport, his voice is so annoying, I honestly have to mute my TV every game, his shrilled voice makes me want to hurt myself, I wouldn't go to these extreme lengths if it was on ITV for example as its free, but I/We pay for BT Sport. I didn't think it was possible but he is worse then Adrian Chiles. I'd rather listen to Louie Spence for 90 minutes then him.
